info.name: Gebeta Delivery API - Complete Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for Gebeta Delivery backend hosted at https://gebeta-delivery1.onrender.com

request.description: Register a new user and receive OTP for verification
Login with phone number and password
Get all addresses of current user
Admin: Get specific user by phone
Get restaurants with distance from user coordinates
Manager/Admin: Get restaurants by manager ID
Get restaurant with full menu and categories
Get all menus for a specific restaurant
Get all foods in a specific menu
Estimate delivery fee for an order
Get all orders for current user

variable.description: Pending, Preparing, Cooked, Delivering, Completed, Cancelled

request.description: Admin: Get all orders by status
Get all orders for a specific restaurant
For delivery persons: Get available cooked orders
Get count of available cooked orders
Get orders assigned to current delivery person
Get delivery history for current delivery person
Delivery person accepts an order for delivery
Update order status (Preparing, Cooked, Delivering, etc.)
Delivery person verifies pickup from restaurant
Verify delivery completion with customer code
Assign delivery person to an order
Cancel delivery assignment for an order
Get all reviews for a restaurant
Create a review for a restaurant
Create a rating for an order/delivery
